Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory126.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "...It's a complete failure. Looks like we've still overestimated our power.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The Ascendants are formidable foes after all. Though that "Huaxu" thing\'s taken, we still kept the city intact in the end... Sort of.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After the battle in Kowloong, Akdilek and the Forsaken returned to their campsites to rest. The leaders are now sitting and discussing the next issue.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "But they likely won't be thanking us for this. Most of Kowloong is in ruins. Even if they manage to salvage the place, rebuilding will likely be hell for them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Speaking of, you know what the link chamber is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've heard of it before from some member who left Babylonia. It's a machine that allows a commandant to link remotely, or something... So what about it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Babylonia seems to have successfully downsized these chambers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Downsizing... Are they planning something big?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Probably. I only know that Babylonia is using their results for the foundation of their next step.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So that's why they're leaving squads in Kowloong to help them rebuild...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "That's all the info I got. What about your end, Forsaken boss?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't get it wrong. I never agreed to exchange information with you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Looks like you're trying to do a dine and dash on my train.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's face takes on a stunned expression as Jamilah's words leave her mouth. After a short pause, he sighs resignedly."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Fine. Just know that this info isn\'t something you can use as "goods."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Whether it can or can't is something I'll decide.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe hands a terminal to Jamilah. The screen shows a coordinate and a huge red X.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This is information I got from... an Ascendant. It's supposedly their next target.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'That red X is pointing to another Ascendant... Are Ascendants targeting other Ascendants?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Well, apparently, the leader of Kowloong is also an Ascendant. Maybe the Ascendants aren't all on the same side.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Indeed, this is also a possibility.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'If there is infighting among the Ascendants, we will have an easier time, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The one who spoke is Changyu, who has just finished vehicle maintenance. Sophia follows, holding her tools.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Speaking of which... Leader, should we consider going to a water park for our next stop?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'A water park?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Yep. The location those coordinates point to is called... What was it...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Venus Splash Park. In records of the Golden Age, it seems it was a "movie-themed private water park."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Yep, yep, that one. Sophia and I happened to see it while assessing the database, and we even discussed going there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...You're the one who wants to go, Changyu.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You didn't say you don't want to, Sophia!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But Sophia has warned Changyu that the Venus Splash Park is surrounded by the ocean and there is no known track leading there.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: '...What a strange choice. Have you heard anything else?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's all. The Ascendants didn't hide their tracks intentionally, and if Babylonia is not blind, they will know soon after we know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Is that why you said this can no longer be called "goods"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yes... If we calculate from the time we boarded the vehicle, it should be arriving at the station about now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Right. Just get off at the broken stop ahead?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "If it's you guys, I think it won't hurt to stay on the train. We will have an empty carriage after the re-org. So how about it? Want to become an Akdilek member?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Stop joking. The Forsaken are an independent group and we have no interest in serving anyone else.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I know you have a history with Babylonia, but that shouldn't stop us from working together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No need to worry about that. The Forsaken... are not a group formed from grudges and obsessions.', 4: '2'}
